CustomField.formula: DATEVALUE(IF( AND( ISBLANK(FinServ__LastTransactionDateJointOwner__c), ISBLANK(FinServ__LastTransactionDatePrimaryOwner__c) ), NULL, IF( BLANKVALUE(FinServ__LastTransactionDatePrimaryOwner__c, DATETIMEVALUE("1900-01-01 00:00:00")) > BLANKVALUE(FinServ__LastTransactionDateJointOwner__c, DATETIMEVALUE("1900-01-01 00:00:00")), FinServ__LastTransactionDatePrimaryOwner__c, FinServ__LastTransactionDateJointOwner__c ) ))
CustomField.label: Last Transaction Date
